name: Bubbles
body:
Used three late days.
Runnable application is with the code. Click to create new bubbles. 'WASD' to control camera.

(5) Realtime rendering	
(5) Video documenting your system and highlights features	
(5) 3D rendering, with user-controlled camera	
(5) Eulerian (1st order)	

(50) 3D	deformable objects
(10) Real-time user interaction	with system	
(10) Spawn particle system from simulation

(5) Art Contest:
![Bubbles](https://raw.github.com/rhodon/bubbles/master/wiki/Screen%20Shot%202013-10-13%20at%203.45.28%20PM.png)
Bubbles in the universe.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3tZUSCN0FbE
